examples.example: 公司的管理层一直在努力提升员工们的工作效率和满意度。

translate.english: The management of the company has been constantly trying to improve the work efficiency and satisfaction of the employees.

examples.example: 他在管理团队方面有着独特的方法和出色的能力。

translate.english: He has unique methods and excellent abilities in managing the team.

examples.example: 他把自己的学习时间管理得井井有条，成绩也有了显著提高。

translate.english: He manages his study time in an orderly manner, and his grades have also significantly improved.
